title: Munching And Hunching
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s a shoot the shit episode. No hot button. No segments. Just whatever comes up. Brace yourselves. 

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio, video and BTS images) and Livestream Tour: https://www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast 

Black Business of the Week - Dr. Tykeia Robinson’s DMX Tribute https://t.co/SXAZf52yOn?amp=1

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Little Rock CVB - Home to dozens of Black-owned businesses and restaurants and six sites on the U.S. Civil Rights Trail, Little Rock is the perfect spot for your next vacation. Whether you’re big on food or fashion, history or heritage, you’re going to be big on Little Rock. Plan your visit today, at https://www.littlerock.com

Cricket Wireless - Cricket Wireless can help you make the easy switch to the mobile plan that’s right for you, starting at $30 a month. Activation and other fees and restrictions apply. Terms subject to change. See store for details. 

Tushy - This is a special offer for our listeners, go to https://hellotushy.com/FRIENDZONE for 10% off

Honey - Get Honey for FREE at https://www.joinhoney.com/FRIENDZONE

Native - Make the switch to Native TODAY by going to https://www.nativecos.com/friend, or use promo code friend at checkout and get 20% off your first order.

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/thefriendzonepodcast 
Discord - TBA

Have a GREAT DAY!
